text: Bakary Fofana is a former minister for foreign affairs for Guinea. He served from 17 February 2010 to 21 December 2010, under Prime Minister Jean Marie Dore. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Government ministers of Guinea Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Union for the Progress of Guinea politicians
title: Bakary Fofana (politician)
